smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function testMigrate6to7 is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: File 'KotlinExtensions.kt' with '31' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'
Class 'MainActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'FreshRSSDabatabase' with '27' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'SubscriptionsDAO' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onCreateView appears to be too complex.

The function showProgress appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface SubscriptionsDAO is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function refresh has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (onSuccess) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: onSuccess
Parentheses in (count ?: 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: count ?: 0

Parentheses in (resources.getDimensionPixelSize(R.dimen.badge_active_text_size) -
                resources.getDimensionPixelSize(R.dimen.badge_inactive_text_size)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: resources.getDimensionPixelSize(R.dimen.badge_active_text_size) -
                resources.getDimensionPixelSize(R.dimen.badge_inactive_text_size)
Parentheses in (offset / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: offset / 2
Parentheses in (offset * 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: offset * 2
Parentheses in (subscriptions ?: listOf()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: subscriptions ?: listOf()

smells.name: OptionalUnit
smells.description: Return type of 'Unit' is unnecessary and can be safely removed.

instances.message: The function unit defines a return type of Unit. This is unnecessary and can safely be removed.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)
